IN RE: ADOPTION OF E.V., a Minor Petition of: K.J.A., Jr., Natural Father In re: Adoption of J.A., a Minor Petition of: K.J.A., Jr., Natural Father No. 22 WAL 2018
No. 23 WAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. March 26, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM

AND NOW, this 26th day of March, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
